articles.author: Ben Talintyre
articles.title: Aussies caught up in India-Pakistan conflict
articles.description: Australian cricket stars are desperately trying to rush home as a rising conflict between India and Pakistan has not only led to the suspension of the Indian Premier League (IPL) but has left players on the ground fearing for their safety.

articles.title: Stuart MacGill: Former Australia cricketer avoids jail over drug deal
articles.description: Former Australia cricketer Stuart MacGill avoids jail after being found guilty of  taking part in the supply of cocaine.
articles.content:
Former Australia cricketer Stuart MacGill has avoided jail after being found guilty of taking part in the supply of cocaine.
The 54-year-old was given a 22-month intensive corrections order and 495 … [+993 chars]
